response.answer_text: Trump wearing a mask now, after denying denying and denying its importance for months, is next to useless as an example of anything, other than the man’s complete disregard for other lives. He is to empathy and human suffering what a camel is to motorbikes and brassieres - complete indifference. No, good and example are antipathetic here. Good and Trump are antipathetic as well. He was briefed on Ratings - Ratings - Ratings before he went to the Vet. That’s the ONLY reason he wore one. Call it like it is. Even Stalin had a love of animals and kept many on a farm. Trump likes some animals - chickens for examples. Deep fried with mashed potatoes.

Too little too late of an effort. He still can’t quite grasp what a leader is supposed to do. Lead by example not follow for vote pandering. Next stop should be Miami just to reinforce to the public that it is a good idea to wear a mask. Make a surprise trip to Houston after Miami. Don’t forget those MAGA hats I am sure they are in short supply. I hear they are a good substitute for the barf bags they ran out of. When you get back to the WH take a good long look in the mirror.

Trump finally gave in to the pressure to wear a mask. As a result of being pathologically self-absorbed, he may not have initially considered the fact that by not wearing a mask he was putting a number of his devotees at risk by setting a bad example. He loathes backing down but has apparently come to the realization that he has already been responsible for an untold number of COVID-19 deaths as the result of supporters following his lead by refusing to wear a mask.
